info.task: navigate backwards to collapsed disclosure button
info.title: Navigate backwards to a collapsed disclosure button in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the first disclosure button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the first disclosure button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name, 'What do I do if I have a permit for an assigned lot, but can't find a space there?', is conveyed
State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed
